353
375
Welcome to U6O! Using your arrow keys go to the @WALK @HERE location.
352
375
351
375
To @talk, press @T, type something, then press enter. (This talks @locally to players onscreen.)
350
375
349
375
To send a @global message to all players, hold SHIFT and press T.
348
375
347
375
To send a @private message to a player, press T, type, then click on the player.
346
375
345
375
NPCs (computer controlled players) only respond to private messages to them.
345
376
345
377
You can stop the walkthrough by saying @WALK @STOP at any time, but it is recomended you complete it.
345
378
345
379
If your name is NEW PLAYER, restart U6O and select the CREATE CHARACTER to create a permanent character.
345
380
346
380
347
380
Press @U then click on doors to @use them. Most objects are used this way.
348
380
349
380
You lose @Karma for unvirtuous acts like stealing or lying.
350
380
@WARNING! If you lose all your Karma your character will be permanently erased!
351
380
352
380
353
380
353
381
@Look at the items on the table by pressing @L and clicking on them. Note that taking them would be stealing!
353
382
352
382
351
382
To be safe, in your character's entire lifetime try to steal less then 16 items.
351
383
351
384
351
385
Your STR, DEX and INT stats were determined by the Gypsy's A or B questions.

You can heal gradually by eating @food. There is some meat in your inventory.
1098
103
1097
103
If you're hurt, @eat! (Hold the food on your mouse cursor, press @U, then click on yourself.)
1096
103
1095
103
Remember that eating more food makes you heal for longer, not faster.
1094
103
1093
103
You don't always have to follow the WALK HERE exactly, such as if enemies come.
1092
103
1092
104
If you're badly hurt by enemies, run back and heal, then continue the walkthrough.
1092

1092
107
1092
108
1092
109
If you die, send a @global message and another player may come and @resurrect you at no XP cost!
1092
110
Or you can press @F1, and @resurrect yourself, loosing an 8th of your XP.
1092

If you quit while dead it has the same effect as pressing F1!

51
The @invisiblity @ring only lasts a short time, so only use it in emergencys, to run away.
1635
51
1636
51
The @wands are powerful ranged weapons. Remove your old weapons, and equip the wands.
1637
51
1638
51
Make sure you keep the old weapons, as the wands disappear after a number of shots.
1639
51
1640
51
To see about how many shots are left, @look at the wand's description.
1641
51

52

The shrine was taken over by gargoyals! But we cannot beat them in combat at this stage.

396
So we will try to lure them away from the shrine. Beware they can @paralyze you from 8 squares away!
436
395
436
394

436
393
It's best to lure them away, and run back using the invisibility ring so they dont follow.

348
Pick up the @rune (in your inventory) with your mouse and @use it on the pink force field.
487
349
488
349
Now take the moonstone, the tiny grey stone on the altar.
489
348
Then talk to the shrine to meditate using the mantra of Compassion to level up.

Different spells use different reagents. @Heal uses @spider @silk and @ginseng. 
558
331
559
331
560
331
561
331
562
331
563
331
564
331
Talk to the mage, buy a @spellbook, @heal @spell (1st circle) and some @ginseng and @spider @silk.
564
330
Click on the spell, press L, then click on the spellbook to put the spell into the spellbook.
564
331
Now equip your spellbook. The blue number is how many times you can cast using your reagents.
563
331
562
331
561
331
560
331
559
331
558
331
557
331
556
331
556
332
@Cure spells are sold by @Xiao who lives across the sea in @Moonglow.
556
333
556
334
556
335
556
336
The @cure spell requires the reagents @garlic and @ginseng. Get the cure spell asap!
556
